scripts.javascript: cd javascript && npm install && npm run start
scripts.python: cd python && bash -c 'pip install virtualenv && virtualenv venv && source venv/bin/activate && pip install django && pip install django-crispy-forms && pip install crispy-bootstrap4 && python manage.py runserver 3000'
scripts.react: cd react && npm install && npm run dev
scripts.test: cd cheatsheets && npm install && npm run test
